baseRule.text: 「若比丘尼，知有負債難、病難，與受具足戒，波逸提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 168

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼度長病女人。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 125

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼度負債女人。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 127
